Amazfit GTS 2 mini Smart Watch

The Amazfit GTS 2 mini comes with a borderless design. It features a 1.55-inch AMOLED screen, meaning your display will be exciting, vibrant, and practical whenever you check the time. It features carefully curved 2.5D glass to enhance your most fashionable outfits. With a light 19.5 g weight, a thickness of 8.95 mm (without the sensor base), and a skin-friendly silicone strap, the GTS 2 mini allows you to enjoy the lightness of time. With 80+ watch faces to choose from, most of which have a matching Always-on Display, you can make sure you're always in style and able to see the interface you like. Or, to make the watch face truly yours, upload your own photos to the background and focus on what you care about with the custom modular dial. The Amazfit GTS 2 mini can provide heart rate monitoring, blood-oxygen saturation measurement, sleep monitoring, stress level monitoring, and female cycle tracking, as well as other functions to achieve total health management from your wrist. The PAI health assessment system also processes complex health data with an advanced algorithm to present your physical condition in a simple, single-value score. Blood-oxygen saturation (SpO2) is one of the most important indicators of human health. You can easily test your SpO2 level anytime you need. It supports a 24-hour high-precision heart rate monitoring function and it gives warnings to protect you from the probability of accidents. You can talk to Alexa on your Amazfit GTS 2 mini as it comes with Alexxa built-in. The Amazfit GTS 2 mini-features over 70 built-in sports modes. A fully charged battery provides up to 14 days of battery life. The Amazfit GTS 2 mini has 01 year warranty (For Warranty Claim you  Must submit Box along with accessories. physical Damage or dent/ scratch will not  be accepted for warranty.)

full_description:
Amazfit GTS 4 1.75-inch AMOLED Display Smartwatch

The Amazfit GTS 4 AMOLED Display Smartwatch features an aluminum frame. It sports a 1.75-inch HD AMOLED display with Always-on-Display (AOD), a screen resolution of 390450 pixels, and over 150 watch faces. The BioTracker 4.0 Health Data sensor contains a heart rate monitor (including swimming heart rate tracking), a SpO2 monitor, and a sleep tracker. There is an option to track four health parameters with a single tap. The GTS 4 also has over 150 sports modes, sophisticated identification of strength training workouts, and 8 sports modes. It may also deliver live sports data broadcasts. Furthermore, the exercise data may be linked to the Adidas Running and Strava applications.

Ultra-large 1.75" HD AMOLED Display

It's time to take a step back and look at the larger picture of your health and fitness. Immerse yourself in the ultra-large 1.75" AMOLED display, where you can see the data that important to your wellness journey in immaculate HD clarity. â

Powerful & Accurate Health Technology

The Amazfit GTS 4 has the new BioTracker 4.0 PPG biometric sensor. Because of the ultra-thin 0.4mm glass foundation, the sensor now captures 33% more data and is 33% more accurate than the previous iteration. This sensor, paired with the watch's enhanced heart rate tracking algorithm, considerably decreases possible signal interference caused by arm movement during exercise, resulting in heart rate tracking that rivals that of heart rate belts. Enjoy very precise 24-hour monitoring of heart rate, blood-oxygen saturation, and stress levels. The watch can also detect your respiratory rate and rapidly assess these four crucial health measures with a single tap.

150+ Sports Modes

Get down to business with over 150 sports modes to choose from, including Strength Training, Golf Swing, and many more. When it's time for that well-deserved beach holiday, the watch can track your swimming stats and withstand up to 50 meters of water pressure.

Live Sports Data Broadcast

The Amazfit GTS 4 Receives live notifications for sports statistics such as heart rate and hydration reminders, distance covered, and more via the watch's speaker or Bluetooth headphones.

Music Storage & Playback

For a workout motivation boost that only your favorite song can provide, save music on the watch for immediate playing - or even seamlessly manage your phone's audio over Bluetooth.

Offline Voice Assistant

The Amazfit GTS 4 Even if you don't have an internet connection, you can use voice commands to activate a sports mode, access a health feature, and do other things. Tell the watch to "Up Your Game" for a built-in surprise.

Answer Bluetooth Phone Calls

The Amazfit GTS 4 can accept and answer phone calls, as well as keep track of personal and business contacts, via Bluetooth connection to your phone.

Features Suitable for Any Lifestyle

Improve your day with the GTS 4's enhanced Shortcut Cards. Get all the information that's essential to you organized into one super-clear list - with event-related cards like To-do List, Alarm Clock, and even your currently-playing music shown at the top - for quick and simple reading. The Amazfit GTS 4 Smartwatch comes with a 01-year warranty.

Amazfit Pop 3R Limited Classic Edition Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch (Metallic Strap)

The Amazfit Pop 3R Limited Classic Edition Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch has a 1.43-inch (3.63 cm) HD AMOLED display with a resolution of 466 x 466 pixels, which provides clear graphics and an always-on display feature. In addition to adding a sense of elegance and durability, the traditional round metallic shape has a surface that resists scratches. This smartwatch guarantees intelligent interactions and smooth communication since it has both an AI voice assistant and Bluetooth calling capabilities. With support for more than 100 sports modes and 24-hour heart rate, SpO2, and stress monitoring, health monitoring is comprehensive. Including an accelerometer, heart rate sensor, and 3-axis motion sensor, among other sensors, the Amazfit Pop 3R Limited Classic Edition Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch ensures accurate tracking of your activities and health indicators. Vibration is used to convey notifications for sedentary reminders, calls, calendar events, and smartphone apps. This allows you to stay informed without constantly checking your phone. A rechargeable lithium battery that takes 90 minutes to fully charge via a charging base may power the smartwatch for up to 12 days. Breath training, music control, camera management, finding the phone, and a full range of reminders and settings, such as vibration and brightness, are among the other features. Operating within a 10-meter Bluetooth range, the Amazfit Pop 3R Limited Classic Edition Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch utilizes Bluetooth version 5.2 for connectivity and supports both iOS and Android operating systems.
